Player History
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 10/3/1985, off Mike Mason (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1986, off Ed Whitson (NYY)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (Y) on 6/15/1987...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,564,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/9/1988 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Injured on 9/26/1988 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,021,429 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,021,429 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 6/16/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/3/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,001 per year...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1991...
Injured on 3/29/1992 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
